document_data.caption: Karrundax the Red
document_data.name: Karrundax
document_data.mainbody: '''Karrundax the Red''' was a young [[red dragon]] that made [[Caverns of Karrundax|her lair]] within the [[River of Flame]] that flowed within the deepest reaches of [[Mount Hotenow]].
document_data.Activities: The young red dragon claimed an [[earthmote]] that floated within the caldera of Mount Hotenow as her lair, but also maintained one in the caverns that extended out from the subterranean [[River of Flame]].
document_data.Relationships:
Karrundax formed an alliance with the fire giant [[Gommoth]] after he formed the [[cult of Maegera]] within Mount Hotenow. She allowed them to utilize a portion of her lair in exchange for the protection of her brood, requesting that the [[fire giant]] mercenary [[Pyraphenia]] serve as her personal guardswoman.

As a token of camaraderie, Gommoth bestowed upon Karrundax the [[Hand of Maegera]], an [[elemental]] that he and his cultists created.
document_data.History:
[[File:Karrundax Overhead.png|thumb|right|300px|Karrundax flying over Mount Hotenow]]
Some time around the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], Karrundax' brood of eggs hatched, spawning at least five red [[wyrmling]]s. 

Karrundax and her offspring were slain by the [[Heroes of the Sleeping Dragon Bridge]] in the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, around the time of the dissolution of the cult of Maegera.
